mdRecord.dcterms:description: Commonwealth vs William Simonis Offense: Breaking and entering and theft of spirits Victim and Complainant: Pontan Dickerson Not Guilty: Court Cost: $9.50 Recorded in Floyd County Courthouse 12.26.1887
